data.description: Develop knowledge of diverse populations and the ability to promote physical activity and well-being for a lifetime. Apply knowledge of barriers and the use of inclusive techniques to develop meaningful experiences and programs.
data.title: PHYSICAL ACTIVITY FOR DIVERSE ABILITIES

data.description: Focused and rooted on the application of biological, cultural, social, and research-based practices for professional development in promoting physical activity for everyone, especially those with a variety of disabling conditions.  Work as individuals or teams to plan and implement specified physical activities for individuals with diverse abilities in a variety of settings, including the adapted fitness gym, recreational and competitive endeavors and the home-based exercise.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO PHYSICAL ACTIVITY PROGRAMMING FOR DIVERSE ABILITIES
